title: Germany ´incredibly bitter´ as Sweden inflict worst tournament loss since 1991
description: Germany forward Klara Buhl said the team are “incredibly bitter” after Sweden inflicted their heaviest tournament defeat in 34 years at Euro 2025. Germany, who are among the favourites to win a record-extending ninth European crown in Switzerland, entered matchday three knowing a victory would secure top spot in Group C. title: Wantaway Gyokeres to be disciplined by Sporting after skipping training
description: Viktor Gyokeres will face disciplinary action from Sporting CP after failing to turn up for training, as the striker pushes for a move to Arsenal. Arsenal have been locked in talks over a move for Gyokeres, who has scored 68 goals in the Primeira Liga since swapping Coventry City for Lisbon in 2023.
